SELECT
,d.`value` AS subjectDifficulty FROM t_subject s, t_subject_type t, t_category c, t_dictionary d WHERE s.`category_id`=c.`id` AND s.`subject_type_id`=t.`id` and s.status = 1 and s.`difficulty` = d.`id`

SELECT
FROM t_subject s, t_subject_type t, t_category c
s.category_id = c.id
AND c.id = #{categoryId}
AND s.subject_type_id = t.id
AND t.id = #{subjectTypeId}
AND s.name LIKE CONCAT (#{name},'%')
